meanings.sent1: She kept misdialing the number and couldn't reach her friend.
meanings.sent2: I always end up misdialing when I try to call my grandma.
meanings.sent3: After misdialing for the third time, she realized she was entering the wrong area code.
meanings.sent4: His fingers seemed to have a mind of their own, constantly misdialing the digits on the phone.
meanings.sent5: The frustration of misdialing repeatedly made her wish for a simpler way to make calls.

meanings.definition: The act of making an error while dialing a phone number.
meanings.sent1: His frequent misdialing caused him to save the correct number in his contacts.
meanings.sent2: The misdialing of emergency services can delay help in urgent situations.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors began with a simple misdialing of a phone number.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of numbers, his mind felt like it was constantly misdialing the right combination.
meanings.sent5: The loud beep after each misdialing made her realize she needed to slow down and focus.
